trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_SEQ_00<tab>Hancock seems to be quite pleased with himself.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Hancock.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_SEQ_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_TODO_00<tab>Follow Hancock.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Hancock.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_LYSE_000_001<tab>So that building's filled with Garleans...
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Some might deem it unwise to loiter outside the gates of the consulate of a hostile empire.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_TATARU_000_010<tab>Danger, excitement. Intrigue! Oh, my!
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>Compared to the Hingan architecture, this is drab and uninspired. Or perhaps I've had my fill of Garlean aesthetics, such as they are.

TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_HANCOCK_000_020<tab>There is oh so much more I could speak of─the soothing waters of the onsen, the ephemeral delights of the pleasure district─but you are doubtless still weary from your long sea voyage.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_HANCOCK_000_021<tab>Let us retire to the company offices.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_LYSE_000_025<tab>Even though this feels just as out of place as the Garlean Consulate, it's a lot more...comforting.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALISAIE_000_026<tab>...There is no denying that this place was built for an Ul'dahn.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_TATARU_000_027<tab>Ahhh, the unmistakable scent of wealth and power...
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALPHINAUD_000_028<tab>(I daresay we could travel to Meracydia or the New World and find a man like Hancock waiting for us.)
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_EATCASSISTANT_000_030<tab>Greetings, sirs and ladies, and welcome to the Kugane branch offices of the East Aldenard Trading Company.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_HANCOCK_000_040<tab>At long last, we arrive at our destination. May I present to you our humble offices.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_HANCOCK_000_041<tab>We have much to discuss, so I will refrain from further prattle. Come, come, right this way!

TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_LYSE_000_045<tab>I'm not sure how I imagined our time in the Far East unfolding, but it definitely didn't involve Ul'dahns. And especially not <var 1A 02 /var>these<var 1A 01 /var> Ul'dahns. Still...whatever works, right?
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>He was not exaggerating when he spoke of their wards' efficacy. Whoever wove them did so with consummate skill...
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_TATARU_000_055<tab>Oh, this place takes me back! It reminds me of the workshop of an Ul'dahn lapidary I once served!
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_HANCOCK_000_056<tab>I must confess, I am an avid collector of all things Far Eastern. See for yourself. I insist!

TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Though I am reluctant to take any action whatsoever that could be construed as placing ourselves in Lord Lolorito's debt...we must avail ourselves of what means are available.
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>Our Ala Mhigan allies placed their faith in us, and I do not intend to disappoint them...
TEXT_STMBDA203_02472_EATCASSISTANT_000_065<tab>The Scions are always welcome here. Shall I show you inside?
